Source: https://sl.maptons.com/1961208. Beeshoek Project is located 7 km west of Postmasburg in the Northern Cape Province of South Africa. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.mining.com/web/south-african-iron-ore-mine-to-close-after-arcelormittal-halts-purchases/. The Beeshoek mine is currently placed on care and maintenance due to the cessation of purchases by its sole customer, ArcelorMittal South Africa

web_search_companies.notes: Beeshoek is operated by Assmang, a joint venture between African Rainbow Minerals and Assore.
